author: Melissa R Johnson

review: the first is the good: extremely easy to set-up and operational in literally 5-10minutes. the streaming is very fast and rarely will you notice any lag time during a show perhaps 1 sec. there is also a lot of content available and it links to things like your netflix and hulu accounts, it is making cable tv past basic local stations an obsolete waste of moneythe not as good: it is a little hard to access all the content and when you do for example movies, its hard to know which movies will cost you extra and how much they seem mixed together. perhaps that is because i am not used to using the system yet. another issue is movie loads quickly but if you want to skip the introductions you have to wait for it to load anyway so to jump a head 10 sec might take 3 second wait. not big deal and could have more to do with my internet speed than the product but it gets annoying none the lessanother downside there is so much available you can waist time just watching movies and series that you never needed to see before. too much time on our hands and now something to do with it I suppose.overall take: a really great product that will change peoples approach to watching TV and movies
